sentences.en: In actuality, Ted did not have a disorder but merely a difficult temperament.
sentences.cn: 事实上，特德并没有什么异常而只是脾气不好。

sentences.en: Nevertheless, Gerteis argues, these disparate party affiliations did not diminish the actuality of reformer unity, most prominent in the 1830s.
sentences.cn: 然而，格泰斯认为，这些不同的政党联盟并没有削弱改革者团结的现状，尤其是在19世纪30年代。

sentences.en: It exists in dreams rather than actuality.
sentences.cn: 它于梦想而非实际中存在。
